Domain Code

Card of domain Code

Name

Code

Code

type_cd

Data Type

char varying(40)

Mandatory

No


Code preview of the domain Code

if exists(select 1 from systypes where name='type_cd')
drop type type_cd
go

/*==============================================================*/
/* Domain: type_cd */
/*==============================================================*/
create type type_cd
from char varying(40)
go
